Interface NeuralNetworkInitializer

All Superinterfaces:
Initializer<NeuralNetwork>, NeuronVisitor
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdalineInitializer, ConstantInitializer, HeInitializer, PerceptronInitializer, RandomNormalizedWeightInitializer, XavierInitializer, XorInitializer
@Strategy(INTERFACE) public interface NeuralNetworkInitializer extends NeuronVisitor, Initializer<NeuralNetwork>
The initializer is used to set the initial parameter value of a neuron

  • Method Details

    • visitNeuron

      default void visitNeuron(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Neuron neuron, int layerIndex, int neuronIndex)
      Called when visiting a single neuron in a specific layer.

      Ensures we do not visit the layer 0 (input nodes).

      Specified by:
      visitNeuron in interface NeuronVisitor
      Parameters:
      neuralNetwork - the neural network being traversed
      neuron - the neuron being visited
      layerIndex - the index of the layer containing the neuron
      neuronIndex - the index of the neuron within its layer

    • initialize

      default void initialize(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Neuron neuron)
      Initializes the parameters of the given neuron
      Parameters:
      neuralNetwork - the neural network the neuron belongs to
      neuron - the neuron for which the parameters should be initialized

    • initialize

      default void initialize(Neuron neuron)
      Initializes the parameters of the given neuron
      Parameters:
      neuron - the neuron for which the parameters should be initialized

    • initialize

      Initializes the given estimation function according to the initialization strategy defined by the implementation.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface Initializer<NeuralNetwork>
      Parameters:
